mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_prd_sku_snapshoot ( id, product_id, sku_id, product_code, product_name, product_key_attr_value_ids, product_key_attr_value_values, product_sku_attr_name_ids, product_memo, store_code, sku_code, sku_name, sku_attr_value_ids, sku_attr_value_values, market_price, sale_price, sku_memo, product_version, sku_version, create_user_code, create_date, update_user_code, update_date, delete_user_code, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{productId}, #{skuId}, #{productCode}, #{productName}, #{productKeyAttrValueIds}, #{productKeyAttrValueValues}, #{productSkuAttrNameIds}, #{productMemo}, #{storeCode}, #{skuCode}, #{skuName}, #{skuAttrValueIds}, #{skuAttrValueValues}, #{marketPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{skuMemo}, #{productVersion}, #{skuVersion}, #{createUserCode}, #{createDate}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteUserCode}, #{deleteDate} )
